00088 /*** IMPLEMENTATION ***/
00089 
00090 template <typename T>
00091 boost::any real_setup_argument<1>::set (const device &d, const boost::any &arg, const int pos, T &that) {
00092         if (pos == 1) {
00093                 typedef typename boost::function_traits <typename T::F> :: arg1_type ARG;
00094                 return that.template setup_argument<ARG> (d, arg);
00095         }
00096         return real_setup_argument<0>::set(d, arg, pos, that);
00097 }
00098         
00099 
00100 template <typename T>
00101 boost::any real_setup_argument<2>::set (const device &d, const boost::any &arg, const int pos, T &that) {
00102         if (pos == 2) {
00103                 typedef typename boost::function_traits <typename T::F> :: arg2_type ARG;
00104                 return that.template setup_argument<ARG> (d, arg);
00105         }
00106         return real_setup_argument<1>::set(d, arg, pos, that);
00107 }
00108 
00109 template <typename T>
00110 boost::any real_setup_argument<3>::set (const device &d, const boost::any &arg, const int pos, T &that) {
00111         if (pos == 3) {
00112                 typedef typename boost::function_traits <typename T::F> :: arg3_type ARG;
00113                 return that.template setup_argument<ARG> (d, arg);
00114         }
00115         return real_setup_argument<2>::set(d, arg, pos, that);
00116 }
